description.oldValue:
Given the sensitivity of Audit log data, many organizations want to add additional layers of protection, including encryption. Customer Managed Key (CMK) allows Organizations to use their own keys giving them control over their encryption. With this update, admins will have the ability to encrypt their Audit log data using CMK.
GA date: June CY2023
description.newValue:
[This feature is postponed indefinitely.] Given the sensitivity of Audit log data, many organizations want to add additional layers of protection, including encryption. Microsoft Purview Customer Key allows organizations to use their own keys giving them control over their encryption. With this update, admins will have the ability to encrypt their Audit log data using Customer Key.
GA date: June CY2023
